title: Anis Birou
text: Anis Birou ( – born 10 January 1962, <a href="Berkane">Berkane</a>) is a Moroccan politician of the <a href="National%20Rally%20of%20Independents">National Rally of Independents</a>. Between 2007 and 2012, he held the position of Secretary of State for Crafts in the <a href="cabinet%20of%20Morocco">cabinet</a> of <a href="Abbas%20El%20Fassi">Abbas El Fassi</a>. He holds a degree in statistics engineering.
